title: New Batman Game: Stop Teasing Us! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.09.19
description:
To get your new wireless plan for just 15 bucks a month, and get the plan shipped to your door for FREE, go to http://mintmobile.com/games.

Greg and Blessing try to help Barrett through the emotional torture WB Games Montreal is putting him in with its LATEST Batman tease. Plus, it's our 600th episode!

Time Stamps - 
00:05:34 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 - WB Montreal teasing Batman again, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:14:10 - Is it safe to assume that the next Batman game is going to be a next gen game? - Best Friends Q:SpacetimeDave
00:21:50 - A WHOLE BUNCHA POKEMON STUFF
00:43:40 - Is it unreasonable for The Pokémon Company to price a 15 year old remake of a DS/GBA game at full MSRP? - Best Friends Q:George
00:48:30 - New SIE Head of Global Business Operations
00:55:15 - Out today
00:55:45 -  MINT MOBILE
 Reader mail   -
01:00:20 - Good morning Blessing and Tim! With the announcement that DBZ:Kakarot is expected to take 35-40 hours to finish and 80-100 to 100% it, I am super hyped for this action-rpg. I was wondering, are any of you also excited for this and what are your expectations from the game? - Will
01:06:40 - Squad Up: Mitchell George(PS4) - TurkeyTrauma, formerly Strk14 (thank Shuhei for PSN name changes)
01:07:40 - IT’S EPISODE 600!
01:13:44 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless and Tim!
